title: My Daughter Lied to Get a Classmate in Trouble
description:
Ron's daughter falsely accused a boy in her class of hitting her, and Ron would like Dr. Laura's advice on how to handle the situation. - Dr. Laura: "Teach her that character should never be compromised."

How good are you at disciplining your children? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
